identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
identity.visual_style: Clean lines, high data density for office, high contrast for mobile. Ice blue accents on dark charcoal.

primary.name: Ice Blue
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key highlights

headings.usage: Page titles, card headers, modal titles. DO NOT use Inter.

mono.usage: Serial numbers, asset tags, invoice IDs

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Gap-4 or Gap-6 for grids.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6. Mix of col-span-1, col-span-2.
grid_system.forms: Max-width-2xl for readability. Two-column layout for dense data.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-600 hover:bg-cyan-700 text-white shadow-sm rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border-2 border-slate-200 hover:border-cyan-500 hover:text-cyan-600 bg-transparent rounded-md

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.base: h-10 rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-cyan-500 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70 mb-2 block text-slate-700

status_badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

scheduler.style: Clean, white background, distinct colored blocks for jobs. Drag and drop visual cues.

engineer_mobile.features: Large touch targets (min 44px). High contrast. Offline indicator.
engineer_mobile.job_card: Prominent status, address, and 'Start Travel' button.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use specific industrial icons: Wrench, Thermometer, Truck, Calendar, ClipboardCheck.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA. Use slate-600+ on white.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements (ring-2 ring-cyan-500).

anti_patterns: Do not use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 or similar.
Do not use gradients for text unless it's a large hero title.
Do not center-align long text blocks.
Do not use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns or modals.

instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'E1' persona. Build a professional, trade-focused tool. Prioritize data density in the office view and touch-friendliness in the mobile view. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes. Use the 'Barlow' font for headings to give it that industrial look.
